title: SGPBS - Send by Email the "6999_FILE_MANIFESTE" file and update the KPIs file on the SharePoint folder

task_list.instruction_title: Send to UBP IT Cutover team the \"6999_FILE_MANIFESTE\" file, via email : [toronto_rundr@ubp.ch](mailto:toronto_rundr@ubp.ch)

Update the KPIs file on the ShareFolder : https://spconfidential/projects/toronto-it/07%20%20Cutover/04%20-%20Controls/KPIs/6998_FILE_KPI_TORONTO_SG_with_UBP_mappingRules_040325.xlsx?d=w27019517ed4d4eccaf018423220fe993
